short_summary: Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Restraint Harness Spares Tender Notice
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01014279  
**Amendment Number**: 1  
**Solicitation Number**: W8485-237291/A  
**Publication Date**: 2022-11-22  
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-19T14:00:00 (Expired)  
**Government of Canada Procurement Service Number (GCPSN)**: 1042204

## Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires restraint harness spares as per the detailed specification below.

## Scope of Work

The DND requires the following items to be delivered to the Canadian Army Aviation Warfare Centre (CAAWC) Trenton by March 1st, 2023:

- Item 1: GSIN 1670, NSN 20-005-1485 - Rip Cord, Parachute (40 units)
- Item 2: GSIN 1670, NSN 20-005-1503 - Handle, Red Ball (5 units)
- Item 3: GSIN 1670, NSN 20-005-1537 - Tail, Crewman Restraint release (20 units)
- Item 4: GSIN 1670, NSN 20-005-1538 - Handle, Cover release assy (20 units)
- Item 5: GSIN 4240, NSN 20-004-6795 - Strap, Safety, Industrial (75 units)
- Item 6: GSIN 4240, NSN 20-004-9766 - Strap, Safety, Industrial (30 units)

## Bidder Requirements

Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide the brand name, model, part number, and NCAGE. All bid documents must be submitted in either English or French.

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada On-line Tendering Business System (Canadabuys.ca) at the following links:

* W8485-237291/A Bid Solicitation English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/a29aca81901aad65ed14d847051437ef/w8485-237291a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/a29aca81901aad65ed14d
